content.question: Two identical blocks, Block <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> and Block <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math>, slide across a horizontal surface. Block <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> has a speed <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math>, and a kinetic energy <math alttext="K sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub></mstyle></math>. Block <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> has a speed <math alttext="2 v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>v</mi></math> and a kinetic energy <math alttext="K sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub></mstyle></math>. Which of the following gives the ratio <math alttext="K sub A to K sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub><mo> </mo><mo>:</mo><mo> </mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub></mstyle></math> and a correct justification?

choices.label: <math alttext="the ratio 1 to 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>1</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>2</mn></mstyle></math>, because kinetic energy is proportional to the speed of the block.

<math alttext="the ratio 1 to 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>1</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>2</mn></mstyle></math>, because half of the blockâ€™s kinetic energy is converted into gravitational potential energy.
<math alttext="the ratio 1 to 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>1</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>4</mn></mstyle></math>, because kinetic energy depends on velocity.

<math alttext="the ratio 1 to 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>1</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>4</mn></mstyle></math>, because kinetic energy is proportional to velocity squared.

content.answer: <math alttext="the ratio 1 to 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>1</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>4</mn></mstyle></math>, because kinetic energy is proportional to velocity squared.

skill.text: 3.C: Justify or support a claim using evidence from experimental data, physical representations, or physical principles or laws.
